message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. Can you meet me at that price?

I understand your offer, Bob, but I'm not quite comfortable with $110. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer you the product for $125. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product!
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $115?
I understand your budget constraints, Bob, and I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer you the product for $122.50. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll be happy with the price!
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $118?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I can offer you the product for $123. It's my final offer, and I'm not willing to go any lower.
